Home.title: Digital products for today’s world.
Home.description: Studio Minsky builds the digital tools that drive business growth. From websites that turn visitors into customers, to custom software that streamlines your operations.

Header.dialogDescription: Quick form. Two steps. We’ll reply within 1–2 business days.

AnimatedText.section1: We build high-performance websites that captivate and convert. Our focus on speed and user experience delivers measurable results.
AnimatedText.section2: AI-powered development allows us to build complex applications faster and more efficiently, reducing time-to-market and saving you costs.
AnimatedText.section3: From sleek marketing sites to complex web applications, our tailored solutions are designed to elevate your brand and drive growth.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: From websites that turn visitors into customers, to custom software that streamlines your operations, every product is designed to increase your impact and efficiency.
Services.webApplicationsDescription: We build robust and scalable web applications tailored to your business needs. From complex dashboards to interactive platforms, we deliver high-performance solutions.
Services.webApplicationsAdditional: Our applications have proven to increase user engagement by an average of 40%.
Services.websitesDescription: Your website is your digital storefront. We create beautiful, responsive, and SEO-friendly websites that capture your brand's essence and convert visitors into customers.
Services.websitesAdditional: We focus on a mobile-first approach, ensuring a seamless experience on all devices.
Services.dataVisualizationsDescription: We transform complex data into clear and compelling visual stories. Our interactive charts and maps help you uncover insights and make data-driven decisions.
Services.dataVisualizationsAdditional: Our visualizations have been featured in several industry-leading publications.
Services.aiIntegrationsDescription: Leverage the power of AI to automate processes and enhance user experiences. We integrate cutting-edge AI models into your products and workflows.
Services.aiIntegrationsAdditional: Automate up to 80% of your customer support inquiries with our AI-powered chatbots.
Services.chatbotsDescription: Engage your audience with intelligent and conversational chatbots. We design and build custom chatbots for customer support, lead generation, and more.
Services.chatbotsAdditional: Our chatbots are available 24/7, providing instant support to your customers.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: A collection of in-house projects, designed and built from scratch. Each represents a deep dive into a specific area of interest—from building full-stack applications to exploring artificial intelligence
Projects.fineInterfaceDescription: Fine Interface is a curated gallery of beautifully crafted user interfaces where the community can submit and save new finds.
Projects.fineInterfaceFeature3: Create Folders to save favorite websites
Projects.panellioDescription: Panellio is a personal management tool designed to help organize your online life, reduce distractions, and boost productivity. It allows users to create directories and add features like notes, tasks, and habits. Panellio also includes an AI assistant to monitor and analyze data.
Projects.panellioFeature2: Add features like notes, tasks, and habits
Projects.panellioFeature3: Monitor and analyze data with AI
Projects.wordInventoryDescription: Word Inventory is a language learning web application with a clean interface, powered by AI. It helps users expand their vocabulary by allowing them to save words, get AI-generated example sentences, and receive grammar explanations.
Projects.wordInventoryFeature2: Get contextual examples from an AI

Process.title: Process
Process.description: Our process is designed for clarity and collaboration, ensuring every project is a partnership that leads to exceptional results.
Process.step1Description: A complimentary call to align on your vision and goals.
Process.step2Description: A tailored proposal with scope, timeline, and transparent investment.
Process.step3Description: We build your solution with precision and provide regular updates.
Process.step4Description: We gather feedback at key milestones and iterate with you.
Process.step5Description: Ongoing support and maintenance packages for long-term success.

Blog.title: Blog
Blog.description: A collection of our thoughts on design, development, and collaboration. Use the tags to filter articles by topic.
Blog.englishOnlyNotice: All blog posts are currently available in English only.

Contact.title: Tell us about your project.
Contact.description: Quick form. Two steps. We’ll reply within 1–2 business days.

ContactForm.validationMessage: Enter your name and a valid email to continue.
ContactForm.servicesLabel: What do you need? (select all that apply)
ContactForm.messageRequired: Please enter a message to continue.
ContactForm.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
ContactForm.confirmation: We’ll be in touch within 1–2 business days.

Footer.description: Studio Minsky — building thoughtful, fast, and accessible web experiences.

Chatbot.greeting: Hi! I’m the Studio Minsky assistant. Ask me about our services, projects, or process.

BlogPage.description: A collection of our thoughts on design, development, and collaboration. Use the tags to filter articles by topic.
BlogPage.englishOnlyNotice: All blog posts are currently available in English only.

Website.heroSubtitle: We build lightning-fast, visually stunning, and user-friendly websites that convert visitors into customers.
Website.feature1Description: Optimized for performance to ensure the best user experience.
Website.feature2Description: Looks perfect on all devices, from desktops to smartphones.
Website.feature3Description: Built to rank high on search engines and attract more traffic.

AI.card1Item1: Automating tasks for more strategic work.
AI.card4Description: AI identifies key trends for growth.

Chatbot.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Chatbot.userRequest: I'd like to start a project.
Chatbot.aiQuestion: Of course! What kind of project are you envisioning?
Chatbot.aiClosing: Understood. We'll be in touch to discuss the details. Thank you!
Chatbot.feedbackQuestion: How was your experience with me?
